content.rendered:
If you have any questions, come onto the discord or write McMeddon via Twitter and let us know, so we can include all the answers onto this page.

What is Stedit

Stedit is a Creative Studio and Community. Focusing on creating awesome crafts for the community to enjoy

When will the Build Rallys happen?

They are planned for the weekends from Friday to Sunday 00:01 – 23:59 UTC

Will there be a 24/7 Server

if enough support and $$$ is available – yes

When will the project start?

The Team Buildup is already ongoing, please look out for the Roadmap as plans are written down and changed.

Do i have to apply?

For the official team, yes but furthermore in the future.

excerpt.rendered: If you have any questions, come onto the discord or write McMeddon via Twitter and let us know, so we can include all the answers onto this page.
